titleStmt.title: Looke on me London I am an honest English-man, ripping vp the bowels of mischiefe, luring in thy sub-vrbs and precincts. Take heed the hangmans halter, and the beadles whip, will make the foole dance, and the knaue to skip.
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Richard, 1573-1659?

titleStmt.title: Looke on me London I am an honest English-man, ripping vp the bowels of mischiefe, luring in thy sub-vrbs and precincts. Take heed the hangmans halter, and the beadles whip, will make the foole dance, and the knaue to skip.
titleStmt.author: Johnson, Richard, 1573-1659?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N. O[kes] for Thomas Archer, and are to bee sold at his shop in Popes-head Palace neere the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Author's name and printer's name from STC.
Imperfect; much staining and print show-through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
